title: NetSuite Integrations
about: NetSuite is a cloud-based ERP that provides accounting services, financial management, CRM, inventory management, e-commerce and more

actions.name: New Record
actions.description: Triggers when a new record is created. Supports standard and custom records

actions.name: New Or Updated Record
actions.description: Triggers when a record is created or updated. Supports standard and custom records

actions.name: Delete Record
actions.description: Deletes an existing record. Supports standard and custom records.

actions.name: Run SuiteQL Query
actions.description: Executes an SuiteQL query over the records.

actions.name: Create or Update RecordCreates a new record if it does not exist
actions.description: If the record already exists, it will be updated. Supports standard and custom records.

actions.name: Find RecordFinds a record based on search field(s) of your choice
actions.description: Supports Standard and Custom NetSuite record types

actions.name: Get Record Type (Object) SchemaRetrieves details & metadata on a record type/object of your choice a record based on search field(s) of your choice
actions.description: Supports Standard and Custom NetSuite record types

actions.name: New Record (Saved Search)
actions.description: Triggers when a new record enters your saved search results

actions.name: Attach Existing File to Record
actions.description: Attach a file from file cabinet to a record.

actions.name: Detach File from Record
actions.description: Removes an existing file from file cabinet from a record

actions.name: Create Record
actions.description: Creates a new record. Supports standard and custom records

actions.name: Upload File to File CabinetUploads a new file to the File Cabinet.
Find File In File CabinetFinds a file in file cabinet based on search criteria.
Find Records (with line-item support)Finds and returns a max of 25 Standard/Custom records that match your search.
